name: moa1
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wmo(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wmo(s0, w1))
-| wi(w1, wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wmo(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wmo(s0, w1))
-| wi(w1, wi(w0, w1))

comment: If an implication holds for at most one value, then its consequent holds for at most one value. See also ~ ala1 and ~ exa1 . (Contributed by NM, 28-Jul-1995.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 22-Dec-2018.) (Revised by BJ, 29-Mar-2021.)
